hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
i=0; while true; do ssh isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu mkdir -p /home/isr/public_html/projects/archstudio-4/www/archstudio && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do rsync -rv --delete-after --delay-updates "${WORKSPACE}/repos-archstudio/archstudio/" isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu:/home/isr/public_html/projects/archstudio-4/www/archstudio/ --filter="- .svn/" && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do ssh isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu mkdir -p /home/isr/public_html/projects/archstudio-4/www/xarchuci && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do rsync -rv --delete-after --delay-updates "${WORKSPACE}/repos-xarchuci/xarchuci/" isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu:/home/isr/public_html/projects/archstudio-4/www/xarchuci/ --filter="- .svn/" && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do ssh isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu mkdir -p /home/isr/public_html/projects/xarchuci/core && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do rsync -rv --delete-after --delay-updates "${WORKSPACE}/repos-xarchlibs-schema/core/" isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu:/home/isr/public_html/projects/xarchuci/core/ --filter="- .svn/" && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do ssh isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu mkdir -p /home/isr/public_html/projects/xarchuci/ext && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
i=0; while true; do rsync -rv --delete-after --delay-updates "${WORKSPACE}/repos-xarchlibs-schema/" isr@openlab.ics.uci.edu:/home/isr/public_html/projects/xarchuci/ext/ --filter="- .svn/" && break || i=$(($i+1)) && [ $i -lt 5 ] || exit 1; done
